div.div: Mount St. Joseph vs. Defiance College

tr.td: Jerry Porter kickoff 60 yards to the DC05, Kenny Jones return 22 yards to the DC27 (Jesse Blevins).
Logan Scott pass intercepted by Colby Webb at the DC29, Colby Webb return 3 yards to the DC26 (DeVonte Cravin).
